articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Greetings to Russian President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Greetings to Russian President
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, sent a message of greeting to Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin, president of the Russian Federation, on Monday.
					 The message said:
					
					 I extend friendly greetings to you and, through you, to your people on the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					
					 I express belief that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the DPRK and Russia forged in the hard struggle against the common enemy would invariably develop in line with the aspiration and desire of the peoples of the two countries.
					
					 Taking myself of this opportunity, I wish you success in your work and your people well-being and prosperity.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Congratulatory Message to General Secretary of C.C., LPRP
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Congratulatory Message to General Secretary of C.C., LPRP
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, sent a congratulatory message to Bounnang Vorachith, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party (LPRP), on Monday.
					 The message said:
					
					 I extend warm congratulations and comradely greetings to you on your 79th birthday.
					
					 I am pleased that the fraternal Lao people are achieving great successes in the work for implementing the decision made at the 10th Congress of the LPRP and the eighth five-year plan for socio-economic development under the correct leadership of the party headed by you.
					
					 I am sure that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties and two states and peoples of the two countries will grow stronger, sincerely wishing you good health and happiness and greater success in your responsible work for defending the country and achieving the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from V. Putin
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from V. Putin
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, received a congratulatory message from V. Putin, president of the Russian Federation, on Monday.
					 The message extended sincere congratulations to Kim Jong Un on the day of liberation.
					
					 We remember with respect the soldiers of the Red Army and Korean patriots who devoted their lives to independence of Korea, the message said, and noted:
					
					 The glorious traditions of friendship and cooperation forged in the years of the war have become the reliable foundation for developing the relations between Russia and the DPRK.
					
					 The Russian president expressed belief that steadily boosting dialogue and profitable cooperation in the fields of economy, science and technology and humanitarian projects between Russia and the DPRK would be in line with the fundamental interests of the peoples of the two countries and contribute to ensuring peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and in the whole of Northeast Asia.
					
					 He wished Kim Jong Un good health and successes and all the people of the DPRK happiness and welfare.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a message of greeting from Mahmoud Abbas, president of the State of Palestine, on Monday.
					 The Palestinian president in the message sent heartfelt and warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un on behalf of the State of Palestine and people and on his own behalf on the day of Korea's liberation and hoped to see the day when the Korean people would enjoy their-desired progress, stability and prosperity.
					
					 Highly appreciating the historical friendship between the two countries and peoples, the president was convinced that he would further boost the friendship by the joint cooperation.
					
					 The president highly appreciated Kim Jong Un's full support to the Palestinian people's struggle to terminate the occupation and build an independent state with East Kuds as its capital to be filled with reconciliation, co-existence, mutual respect and good-neighborliness.
					
					 The president wished Kim Jong Un good health and happiness, extending heartfelt congratulation to him again.

articles.title: Greetings to Congolese President
articles.content:
Greetings to Congolese President
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greeting to Denis Sassou Nguesso, president of the Republic of Congo, on Monday on the 56th anniversary of its independence.
					 The message wished the Congolese government and people great success in the work to build a new society under the guidance of the president, expressing the belief that the bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation would grow stronger.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Visits Kumsong Tractor Factory
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Visits Kumsong Tractor Factory
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju visited the Kumsong Tractor Factory to learn about production there.
					 Going round various places of the factory, the premier encouraged the workers who are waging devoted drive to implement the decision made at the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Discussed at a consultative meeting were the issues of a serial production of Korean-style tractors.
					
					 The premier also toured the Sunchon Forklift Factory and the Kangso Engine Accessory Factory.

articles.title: Japan Urged to Liquidate Its Past Crimes
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Liquidate Its Past Crimes
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Korean Committee on Measures for the Sexual Slavery for Japanese Army and Drafting Victims released a statement Monday, the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation from the colonial yoke by the Japanese imperialists.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Still lingering are sorrow and pain suffered by more than one million Koreans who were mercilessly massacred, over 8.4 million Koreans who were forcibly drafted by the Japanese imperialists and 200 000 Korean women who were forced to serve sex for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					
					 Still trembling with grudge that is left un-vented are victims of sexual slavery and forcible drafting who suffered pain due to crimes against humanity committed by the Japanese imperialists, and those who were exposed to biochemical weapons used by the Japanese imperialists in different parts of the world including Korea.
					
					 However, ringing out from Japan, direct party that committed crimes, are voices justifying the shameful criminal acts, far from repenting of and regretting them.
					
					 The present Japan reminds one of the appearance of Japan more than 7 decades ago when its militarist forces emerged throughout the country being obsessed with war fever while crying out "liberating Asia from the European and American powers".
					
					 Japan has to clearly remember that it is seriously anachronistic.
					
					 World today is no longer what it used to be in the past when Japan was allowed to justify its imperialist arbitrary practices of depriving other country of their sovereignty with a false document and taking away hundreds of thousands of women as sexual slaves.
					
					 The Japanese authorities have to drop wild dream and opt for the past liquidation with frank and sincere attitude to the past crimes and fulfill their responsibility and obligation before the international community.

articles.title: Appeal Issued by All-Korean Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration
articles.content:
Appeal Issued by All-Korean Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- The north, the south and overseas sides committee for implementing the June 15 joint declaration issued an appeal on Monday.
					 Reiterating its firm will to take the lead in realizing the desire of all Koreans for reunification 71 years since the liberation of the country and national division, the All-Korean Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration appealed to all Koreans to do as follows:
					
					 Let's settle the issue of national reunification by the concerted efforts of all Koreans, who are responsible for the issue!
					
					 Let's foil all moves of the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad pursuing division and confrontation, and realize the unity of all Koreans!
					
					 Let's pool nation's efforts and wisdom and promote reconciliation and unity on the basis of respecting each other's social system!
					
					 Let's strive to put an end to joint military drills and other war and confrontation moves harassing peace on the Korean peninsula, and establish mechanism for durable peace!
					
					 Let's resume and make brisk multi-faceted contacts, visits, dialogues and gatherings for reunification among Koreans of various circles at home and abroad!
					
					 Let's proactively push ahead with multi-faceted contacts and visits of organizations of various circles, fields and regions including those of workers, peasants, youths, students, women, scholars, media persons and religionists together with joint national events!
					
					 Let's work hard to realize diverse contacts among all political parties and social organizations in the north and the south and a great national conference for reunification!
					
					 Let's restore as soon as possible the valuable fruitions provided by the north and the south by their joint efforts for reunification, peace and prosperity including the Kaesong Industrial Zone and tour of Mt. Kumgang and open again the sky, ground and sea routes between the north and the south!
					
					 Let's reject the policy of the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad to stoke division and confrontation and overcome today's difficulties and hardships by depending on experience and successes gained in the efforts for paving the road to reconciliation, cooperation, peace and reunification by pooling efforts and wisdom of all Koreans!
					
					 Let's put an end to national division and war-inciting confrontation and open the gate to lasting peace and independent reunification!

articles.title: WPK Delegation Arrives in Kinshasa
articles.content:
WPK Delegation Arrives in Kinshasa
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) headed by Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the WPK, arrived in Kinshasa on Sunday to visit the DR Congo.
					 Greeting the delegation at the airport, the deputy general secretary of the People's Party for the Reconstruction and the Democracy of DR Congo said he was very thankful to Kim Jong Un, chairman of the WPK, for sending a delegation, and warmly welcomed the delegation's visit to the DR Congo.
					
					 We are going to learn lots from the powerful and dignified WPK, he said, hoping that the issues for boosting cooperation and exchange between the two parties would be deeply discussed.
					
					 He was convinced that the current visit of the delegation under the deep care of President Joseph Kabila Kabange will mark an important occasion in demonstrating the good relations between the two parties, two countries and two peoples.

articles.title: Floral Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Service personnel, working people of various social strata, students and children visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 An endless stream of visitors presented floral baskets, bouquets and flowers before the statues of the great leaders on Mansu Hill and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Seen standing before the statues was a floral basket sent by Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Laid before the statues were floral baskets in the names of the party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, institutions, enterprises, factories and schools at all levels here, and bouquets and flowers.
					
					 The participants paid tribute to the great leaders before their statues.
					
					 Floral baskets in the names of KPA units, institutions and enterprises, bouquets and flowers were laid before the statutes and portraits of the smiling great leaders in various places of the city including Kim Il Sung University, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, Ministry of People's Security and the Mansudae Art Studio.
					
					 Service personnel, working people, students and children across the country visited the statues and portraits of the smiling great leaders in their residential areas to pay tribute to them.

articles.title: Russian Embassy Officials Visit Liberation Tower, Cemeteries of Fallen Fighters of Soviet Army
articles.content:
Russian Embassy Officials Visit Liberation Tower, Cemeteries of Fallen Fighters of Soviet Army
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Staff members of the Russian Embassy here laid a wreath before the Liberation Tower on Monday, the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were Alexandr Matsegora, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, staff members of his embassy and members of the delegation of the Russian Orthodox Church led by Antonii, chief for Administration of its Overseas Organs, on a visit to the DPRK.
					
					 After a wreath was laid in the name of the Russian Embassy, the participants paid silent tribute to the fallen fighters of the Soviet Army.
					
					 They looked round the Liberation Tower.
					
					 They also laid a wreath and bouquets before the cemetery of fallen fighters of the Soviet Army in Sadong District, Pyongyang.
					
					 Earlier, officials of the embassy laid bouquets before liberation towers, statues of Soviet soldiers, cemeteries of fallen fighters and monuments to memory of fallen soldiers in local areas. 
					
					 Meanwhile, members of the Russian consulate general in Chongjin laid wreaths before the liberation tower and the cemetery of the fallen fighters of the Soviet Army in Chongjin City.

articles.title: British Labor Party Official Tours Pyongyang
articles.content:
British Labor Party Official Tours Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Glyn Ford, member of the Foreign Affairs Committee of the British Labor Party, and his companion visited the Arch of Triumph.
					 They looked round the grand monumental edifice, being briefed on President Kim Il Sung's feats of liberating the country.
					
					 They also toured the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong, the Nature Museum, the Central Zoo, etc.

articles.title: DPRK Embassy in Havana Hosts Reception
articles.content:
DPRK Embassy in Havana Hosts Reception
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Embassy in Havana hosted a reception on Aug. 12 on the 90th birthday of Fidel Castro Ruz, leader of the Cuban revolution.
					 Invited at the reception were figures of the Communist Party of Cuba, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, the Ministry of Cuban Revolutionary Armed Forces, the Ministry of Trade and Foreign Investment, the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification and the Organization of Solidarity of the Peoples of Africa, Asia and Latin America.
					
					 Present there were the DPRK ambassador to Cuba and members of his embassy.
					
					 Prior to the reception, the participants watched the Korean film "The party and government delegation of the Republic of Cuba led by Comrade Fidel Castro Ruz visits our country".
					
					 The vice-minister of Foreign Affairs of Cuba said that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries provided and developed by the great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il together with Comrades Fidel Castro Ruz and Raul Castro Ruz are the eternally invincible relations.
					
					 He said that these relations are growing stronger day by day under the special care of the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un and Comrade Raul Castro Ruz. He noted Cuba would boost the genuine friendly and cooperative relations with the DPRK no matter how the situation may change.

articles.title: Bush and Obama Termed Top-Class War Criminals in 21st Century
articles.content:
Bush and Obama Termed Top-Class War Criminals in 21st Century
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Ri Song Gun, a researcher at the Institute of American and African Studies under the DPRK Institute of International Studies, released an article titled "Departed souls of scaffold are calling Bush and Obama."
					 The article said that a report was disclosed in the UK recently that the UK's involvement in the U.S.-led Iraqi war in 2003 was unreasonable and illegal.
					
					 The article noted the claim ringing out among  the political, media and other circles of Britain that Blair should make an apology for the UK's involvement in the Iraqi war and be taken to international war criminal court.
					
					 The article said:
					
					 The prime minister of a country recklessly followed the U.S., talking about what he called "special relations" with it, contrary to the public mindset at home. So, he deserves an ill fame as a war criminal.
					
					 In the light of his sins, Blair can be called a war criminal that blindly followed others, whereas Bush, the chief architect of the Iraqi war, a top-class war criminal more hideous than Blair.
					
					 Obama, who caused such political mayhem and bloodshed like "Arab spring" and openly interfered in the internal affairs of Libya, Yemen, Syria and other sovereign states by force only to turn the "war on terrorism" into an endless one, far from making an apology for his predecessor's massacre of more than one million of innocent peaceable citizens in Iraq only, is also a thrice-cursed top class war criminal putting Bush in the shade.
					
					 War criminals deserve merciless punishment.
					
					 The fate of Hitler, Mussolini and Tozyo who brought unheard-of disasters to humankind eloquently proves it.
					
					 The day when heinous war maniacs Bush and Obama will meet deaths on gibbet is not a long way off.
					
					 Departed soul of the fascist war criminals who plunged into the cesspool of history 70 odd years ago is calling Bush and Obama, top-class war criminals in the 21st century.

articles.title: U.S. Is Empire of Evils: DPRK Institute for International Studies
articles.content:
U.S. Is Empire of Evils: DPRK Institute for International Studies
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- O Yong Ran, director of the Institute for American and African Studies under the Institute for International Studies of the DPRK released an article titled "U.S., who are you."
					 The article said: There is on the earth only one state which can hardly be called a state.  That is none other than the empire of evils the U.S. which emerged from the heap of corpses of the native population on the American continent who had lived in peace while creating their own culture for thousands of years.
					
					 In the early period of "the nation-building" the presidents of the U.S. justified territorial expansion to the west as "endowed mission". They were criminals who abused human rights as they adopted it as the state policy to massacre Indians and took presidency for their military achievements in the massacre.
					
					 The U.S. describes the stark fact of massacre as "war" with Indians but it could hardly be called a war as primitive spear-armed Indians had to stand against the American ground forces armed with firepower weapons. It was a horrible massacre of American Indians in all aspects.
					
					 The U.S. nature as man-killers has become all the more undisguised with the passage of time. 
					
					 It massacred more than 600,000 in the Philippines between 1898 and 1905, over 2.47 million in Korea between 1950 and 1953 and at least 3.8 million in Vietnam in 1965-1973.
					
					 As leopard never changes its spots, the brutal nature of the U.S. can never change. 
					
					 Even at this moment, tens of thousands of innocent people are meeting deaths owing to ethnic and factional disputes sparked by the U.S.
					
					 While going through the "maturity" process based on the law of jungle, the U.S. swallowed the whole of the North American continent and turned Latin America into its "tranquil backyard" by dint of the carrot and stick policy. Late in the 19th century to early in the 20th century it stretched its tentacles of aggression to the land across the Pacific.
					
					 After raking up huge profits through the two world wars, the U.S. emerged as a world power. It cried out for "peace by America," being buoyed by ecstasy that it can build a world order wished by it based on its overwhelming economic and military upper-hands.   
					
					 The true nature of the above-said motto was revealed as pronoun of war and destruction from the beginning.
					
					 It was by no means independence which the U.S. brought to weak colonial countries in Asia, Africa and Latin America which kowtowed to the U.S., being steeped in pro-Americanism. It was not prosperity, either. It was an evil cycle of internal disturbance and bloodshed and complete colonization through destruction of national economy and national culture.
					
					 Over 70 years ago the painful history of national division started on this land due to foolish pro-American guys and even at this moment the group of traitors still obsessed by the idea of "peace" offered by the U.S. are working desperately to introduce evil weapons for killing the fellow countrymen.
					
					 When the U.S. launched the Iraqi war with such far-fetched assertion as "concealment of weapons of mass destruction", not content with invading Afghanistan by force of arms and spreading story related to terrorism, people did not realize that the "war on terrorism" was a new war of aggression and a prelude to a new world war.
					
					  Bush's Iraqi war sowed the seeds of factional conflict which had been dormant and Obama's assertion about the withdrawal of the U.S. forces sparked off a new world war throughout the Mideast.
					
					  What is this "peace" for?
					
					 The answer is clear. It is aimed to prolong the remaining days of the U.S. which turned into a huge war machine that gets corpulent through wars and which can not exist without them.
					
					  The U.S. military-industrial complexes are steadily manufacturing new destructive weapons in its hasty preparations for bringing a horrible disaster that can rake up huge profits.
					
					  The U.S. claimed "cultural pluralism" allegedly calling for "establishing macro national culture on the basis of recognizing and respecting the national, racial and linguistic commonness and the value of their differences". But as the mask of the U.S. as "champion of free world" during the Cold War was shaken off, the U.S. plunged again into the whirlwind of racial conflict and contradiction.
					
					  This reached the height with black President Obama, symbolic of "cultural pluralism" in the U.S., taking office, in particular.
					
					  Recently Obama called for racial harmony at a TV appearance but crack in the American society has already entered the phase beyond control.
					
					  Now there do not exist racial and ethnic bonds that have kept the country called the U.S. afloat with difficulty, an indication that the U.S. will sooner or later break to pieces.
					
					  This is the absolute fate the U.S., the empire of evil, has to face.
					
					  The article said that the nuclear weapons were the foremost strength that helped the U.S. lord it over the world for a long time, stressing that now the nuclear weapons are no longer a monopoly of the U.S. 
					
					  It will clearly realize before long what is precipitating its doom.

articles.title: DPRK's Papers Observe Korea's Liberation Day
articles.content:
DPRK's Papers Observe Korea's Liberation Day
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- The DPRK's leading papers on Monday dedicate articles to the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation in praise of President Kim Il Sung's exploits.
					 An editorial in Rodong Sinmun says the President declared the great anti-Japanese war before the world with a high aim to liberate the country from the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule.
					
					 The editorial goes on:
					
					 He set forth an original line of an armed struggle and founded the Korean People's Revolutionary Army, the first Juche-type revolutionary armed forces, from the independent stand that the Korean people should carry out the Korean revolution to suit the specific condition of their country by their own efforts.
					
					 He wisely led the work to strengthen the Juche-type revolutionary forces to achieve the historic cause of national liberation relying on them. Under his leadership, broad sections of patriotic forces against the Japanese imperialists were rallied around the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland, which served as a driving force of leading the overall Korean revolution to a fresh surge.
					
					 The human history of national liberation struggle has not known such a legendary hero and brilliant commander as him who beat down the brutal imperialists in such a difficult conditions with neither state-backing home front nor assistance by a regular army.
					
					 An editorial in Minju Joson says his exploits of national liberation shed rays as an eternal treasure of revolution for the army and people who are dynamically advancing towards a powerful socialist country.
					
					 Article in Rodong Sinmun say that his wisdom of achieving the historic cause of national liberation with the Juche-type revolutionary forces lies in that he provided a guiding force for leading to victory the anti-Japanese revolutionary war, built a powerful main force of the revolution and rallied forces for all-people resistance.
					
					 The paper says that the victory in the anti-Japanese revolutionary war served as a valuable example which inspired the people in colonies to beat back the invaders and gain independence by their own efforts, adding it was a historical event that wrote a brilliant chapter in the world history of anti-fascist struggle.

articles.title: Minju Joson Condemns U.S. for Pushing Int'l Situation into Catastrophe
articles.content:
Minju Joson Condemns U.S. for Pushing Int'l Situation into Catastrophe
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- As reported by foreign media, the U.S. which has already decided to deploy THAAD in south Korea is planning to deploy the same system in Japan and the Philippines.
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson on Monday says:
					
					 It is needless to say that this is a dangerous reckless move to steadily put into a catastrophe the international situation getting tense due to the decision on THAAD deployment in south Korea.
					
					 Now China and Russia are very sharply responding to the U.S. as the latter decided to deploy THAAD in south Korea.
					
					 By announcing its plan to deploy THAAD in Japan and the Philippines, the U.S. disclosed the fact that its THAAD deployment in south Korea for coping with the DPRK's "nuclear and missile threat" is nothing but a pretext.
					
					 The U.S. is intensively deploying the strategic nuclear force in the Asia-Pacific region under the pretext of deterring the DPRK's "nuclear and missile threat" and forming the missile defense network with due consideration given to China and Russia.
					
					 It is hastening the work to form an encircling ring around China and Russia by forming double and treble the triangular military alliance among Japan, south Korea and Australia.
					
					 This clearly proves that it is none other than the U.S. which is destroying and threatening peace and stability in the world.
					
					 From the viewpoint of peace and security of the world, it is a very dangerous development that the Cold War which threw humankind into fear and uneasiness of nuclear war is coming back again.
					
					 The DPRK will more vigorously advance along the road of bolstering up the self-defensive capabilities for security and peace of the country under such a dangerous situation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Park Geun Hye for Pulling up Visit to China by Lawmakers from Opposition Party
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Park Geun Hye for Pulling up Visit to China by Lawmakers from Opposition Party
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Recently the south Korean conservative group are taking issue with China visit by lawmakers from an opposition party as regards the issue of THAAD deployment, branding it as "neo-flunkeyism".
					 Traitor Park Geun Hye, addressing a recent meeting of chief secretaries of Chongwadae, blustered that the opposition party sympathized with China in its stand. The gentries of the "Saenuri Party" claimed China visit was an "irresponsible act of disgracing self-pride" and "sycophantic diplomacy".
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Monday terms it strange.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The chieftain of sycophancy and treachery is Park and her lackeys keen on deploying THAAD while dancing to the tune of the U.S. master.
					
					 The puppet conservative group's taking issue with the lawmakers from the opposition party over their China visit is a ridiculous act of the fools ignorant of their own plight, and a strange behavior of top-class traitors offering everything to the U.S.
					
					 This is aimed to justify their treacherous act with clumsy wordplay and calm down the ever-mounting sentiment against THAAD deployment.
					
					 The puppet group, kingpin of sycophancy and treachery, had better stop provoking laughter of the world but come out to the court of history by itself as unanimously demanded by the people.

articles.title: EU Countries' Arms Sale to Mideast Will Only Stoke Instability and Confrontation: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
EU Countries' Arms Sale to Mideast Will Only Stoke Instability and Confrontation: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- European countries' recent massive arms sales to the Mideast countries where the situation remains complicated are arousing concern of the international community.
					 Shortly ago, Germany announced a plan to sell torpedo boats, submarines and tanks worth billions of euros to Egypt, Kuwait, Oman and other countries in the wake of its approval of sale of 48 patrol boats to Saudi Arabia. France made contracts with Qatar, Egypt, Kuwait and other countries last year on sale of fighter jets, attack copters and frigates worth about 8 billion euros and began the delivery of the jets. Bulgaria, Romania, Slovakia and other east European countries sold various type weapons worth 1.2 billion euros to dispute-torn Mideast countries including Syria and Yemen.
					
					 According to a report released by international survey organizations, a lot of weapons exported by east European countries for the past 4 years are being used by terrorist organizations like "Islamic State".
					
					 The European public and media are terming the arms sales of European countries an "act of exporting death." They comment that the situation in the war-torn Mideast including civil wars in Syria and Yemen are tragic consequences of the irresponsible arms export policy by the governments of European countries.
					
					 This goes to prove that the reckless arms sales of European countries have become another factor of increasing tensions and fostering human rights abuses in the dispute-torn Mideast.
					
					 The above-said increasing arms sales are illegal and unethical acts quite contrary to the codes concerning arms export established by them and the ardent desire of humankind for peace and stability.
					
					 EU arms export regulations stipulate that export of military technology and supplies should be banned in case they may be used for sparking or prolonging armed clashes and escalating tensions in the country which purchased them.
					
					 Laws of European countries concerning arms control ban arms sale if weapons create the danger of wrecking peace or being used for a war.
					
					 As European countries massively sold weapons to dispute-torn Mideast for raking up profits in disregard of those regulations, the situation is getting tenser and the refugee crisis is now beyond control. 
					
					 Their sale of offensive weapons to south Korea, in particular, is resulting in escalating reckless confrontation to disturb regional peace and security.
					
					 In the past European countries talked about "stability of situation" and "peace" louder than any others. Politicians of Europe said that Europe would make a positive contribution to bringing about detente and promoting the peace process on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 It is, indeed, preposterous for European countries to take issue with the DPRK over its just steps for self-defence, terming them "violations of international law."
					
					 European countries would be well advised to keep mum if they are not in a position to do anything helpful to ensuring peace on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: International Seminar on Peace and Reunification on Korean Peninsula Held in Japan
articles.content:
International Seminar on Peace and Reunification on Korean Peninsula Held in Japan
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- An international seminar on peace and reunification on the Korean peninsula took place in Tokyo on July 30 on the 40th anniversary of the formation of the Japan Committee for the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea.
					 Present at the seminar were Fumihiro Himori, chairman of the Japan Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, and other figures of the Japanese organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people, Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, and Peter Woods, co-chairman of the Asia-Pacific Regional Committee for Supporting Peaceful Reunification of Korea.
					
					 Invited there were Nam Sung U, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), and other officials of Chongryon.
					
					 Introduced there were a solidarity message from the Korean Society for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and congratulatory messages from the solidarity organizations of the UK, Colombia, Nepal and other countries. Peter Woods made a keynote report.
					
					 He said that the ordeals and difficulties are lying in the way of Korea's peace and reunification owing to the hostile acts of the U.S. and its followers against the DPRK. He expressed the will to make positive contribution to achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea with the firm faith and will that Korea is one.
					
					 He called upon the world progressive people to conduct more dynamic activities for solidarity with the Korean people to smash the hostile forces' moves to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 Then followed speeches. 
					
					 Adopted there was an appeal to the organizations of all countries for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people and to world progressive people.
					
					 The appeal called for conducting the dynamic solidarity movement to positively support the great national conference for reunification proposed by the DPRK and demand the conclusion of a peace treaty between the DPRK and the U.S. and improvement of the DPRK-Japan relations.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Russian Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Russian Website
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Full text of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Hasten the Final Victory through a Revolutionary Ideological Offensive" was posted on the Russian website Irkutskblogspot. Ru on Aug. 10.
					 The speech made by Kim Jong Un at the 8th Conference of Ideological Workers of the Workers' Party of Korea on Feb. 25, Juche 103 (2014) clarifies that the whole course of the Korean revolution can be called a period of ideological work to give the fullest play to the might of the truth of the revolutionary ideas of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It also indicates tasks and ways facing the field of the party ideological work at present.

articles.title: 9th Congress of Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League Observed by German Organization
articles.content:
9th Congress of Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League Observed by German Organization
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- The German Group for the Study of Korean Culture posted an article on the website of the MS Travel Company of Germany on Aug. 9 on the occasion of the 9th Congress of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League.
					 The article said that the Democratic Youth League of Korea, the predecessor of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, was founded on Jan. 17, 1946 and renamed the League of Socialist Working Youth of Korea as demanded by the developing revolution. It went on:
					
					 The league was developed into the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League in January, 1996.
					
					 It is guided by Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as the political reserves of the Workers' Party of Korea which holds President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem forever, organizationally and ideologically united around Marshal Kim Jong Un as the only center.
					
					 It also regards it as its main mission to carry forward and accomplish the cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the cause of the Juche revolution under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Observed in Bangladesh, Nigeria
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Observed in Bangladesh, Nigeria
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Dakha, Bangladesh and a Korean book exhibition in Zamfara State, Nigeria on Aug. 10 on the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos dealing with the immortal exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were their works, and photos and books introducing the successes registered by the army and people of the DPRK in building a socialist power. 
					
					 The secretary general of the Bangladesh Jatiya Party, the president of the Bangladesh People's League, the chairman of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea and the chairperson of the Bangladeshi preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu praised Kim Il Sung for founding the Korean People's Revolutionary Army, leading the arduous anti-Japanese armed struggle to victory and thus accomplishing the historic cause of national liberation.
					
					 Saying that the DPRK became a political and ideological power and a full-fledged nuclear weapons state thanks to the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il, they stressed that the Korean people are dynamically pushing forward the building of a socialist power despite the moves of the hostile forces to isolate and stifle the DPRK under the wise leadership of HE Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the cause of the preceding leaders. They hoped that Korea would be reunified independently and peacefully.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's National Liberation Exploits Lauded by Romanian Political Party
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's National Liberation Exploits Lauded by Romanian Political Party
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- The New Socialist Party of Romania posted an article on the website "The Juche Idea" on Aug. 9 on the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The article said that President Kim Il Sung, founding father of socialist Korea, accomplished the historic cause of national liberation, and went on:
					
					 The President who embarked upon the road of revolution in his teens to liberate the country set forth the line of armed struggle at the Kalun Meeting in 1930.
					
					 As he set forth the line of achieving the country's liberation by one's own efforts, not by others' help, and in the method of armed struggle, not in a peaceful way, on the basis of the Juche idea and Songun idea, the national liberation struggle of Korea could confidently advance along the scientific and correct road.
					
					 He founded the Korean People's Revolutionary Army on April 25, 1932 and strengthened the revolutionary army and founded the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland in May, 1936 to unite the masses of various circles around it.
					
					 Thanks to the founding of the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland, all the anti-Japanese and patriotic forces of Korea could further expand the struggle for national liberation, united close under the one banner.
					
					 He organized the final attack operation for Korea's liberation and defeated the Japanese imperialists on Aug. 15, 1945, liberating the country.
					
					 The exploits of him who liberated Korea with his Songun leadership will shine long in the world history of the anti-imperialist national liberation struggle.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats for Liberation of Korea Lauded
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats for Liberation of Korea Lauded
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung had performed great feats in accomplishing the cause of national liberation after embarking upon the road of revolution at his early age. 
					 His great feats have been highly praised by the international community. 
					
					 Rashed Khan Menon, chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, said that President Kim Il Sung was an invincible and iron-willed commander who hewed out the Korean revolution and opened up a new era of anti-imperialist struggle with arms.
					
					 Alessandro Lucchini, deputy secretary for Political Affairs of the Communist Party of ItalianÔºçSpeaking Region in Switzerland, noted that the immortal feats performed by the President greatly encourage the world progressives in their struggle for independence, progress and prosperity. 
					
					 Luis Banguera, acting mayor of Esmeraldas City of Ecuador, praised Kim Il Sung as the greatest man, saying that as the President liberated Korea, the history of socialist Korea came to begin and the national liberation struggle of the oppressed people in the world reached a new stage.
					
					 World media also eulogized that thanks to the victory in the anti-Japanese armed struggle waged under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung, the anti-imperialist national liberation struggle of the world oppressed people could enter a period of fresh upsurge.
					
					 Cambodian AKP, Milenium Broadcasting Service of Peru and press media of other countries reported President Kim Il Sung had waged the arduous anti-Japanese armed struggle to liberate the country, proving that peoples of colonial countries can accomplish the cause of national liberation by their own efforts, and the exploits he performed in opening up the new era of national liberation struggle in colonial countries are inscribed in the history of the cause of human independence.
					
					 Russian newspaper Patriot, Nigerian newspaper New Nigerian and Mexican newspaper Unidad Nacional said that the feats of President Kim Il Sung who saved the Korean nation from the bitter fate of being a ruined nation and set an excellent example of anti-imperialist revolutionary struggle will shine forever in the world history of national liberation struggle together with the modern history of Korea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion al presidente ruso
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion al presidente ruso
Pyongyang, 15 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Jong Un, envio este lunes un mensaje de felicitacion al Presidente de la Federacion Rusa, Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin. 
					La misiva senala:
					
					En ocasion del 71o aniversario de la liberacion de Corea, envio el saludo fraternal a Vd. y por su conducto, al pueblo de su pais. 
					
					Estoy convencido de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion Corea-Rusia, preparadas en la ardua lucha contra el enemigo comun, se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran invariablemente conforme a la aspiracion y deseo de los pueblos de ambos paises. 
					
					Aprovecho esta oportunidad para desearle a Vd. los exitos en su trabajo y al pueblo ruso, el bienestar y la prosperidad.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion a Bounnhang Vorachith
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion a Bounnhang Vorachith
Pyongyang, 15 de agosto (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, envio este lunes un mensaje de felicitacion a Bounnhang Vorachith, Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Popular Revolucionario Lao.
					El texto senala:
					
					En ocasion del 79o cumpleanos de Vd., le hago llegar mis calurosas felicitaciones y cordial saludo camaraderil. 
					
					Estoy regocijado de que bajo la correcta orientacion del Partido Popular Revolucionario Lao encabezado por Vd., el hermano pueblo laosiano alcanza grandes exitos en la materializacion de la resolucion del X Congreso del Partido y en el cumplimiento del 8o plan quinquenal de desarrollo socioeconomico. 
					
					Convencido de que las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos partidos, los dos Estados y los pueblos de los dos paises se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran mas, le deseo de todo corazon a Vd. buena salud y felicidad y mayores exitos en sus responsabilidades por la defensa de la patria y la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion del presidente ruso
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion del presidente ruso
Pyongyang, 15 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Jong Un, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el dia 15 el Presidente de la Federacion Rusa, Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin. 
					El texto va como sigue:
					
					Su Excelencia Kim Jong Un
					
					En ocasion del dia de la liberacion, le extiendo mis sinceras felicitaciones. 
					
					Con motivo de esta fiesta, recordamos con reverencia a los militares del Ejercito Rojo y los patriotas coreanos que dedicaron sus vidas por la independencia de su pais. 
					
					La tradicion gloriosa de amistad y cooperacion, preparada en los anales de la guerra, sirve hoy tambien de fidedigno fundamento para el desarrollo de las relaciones entre Rusia y la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					Estoy seguro de que seguir ampliando el dialogo y la cooperacion provechosa en la economia, las ciencias y tecnicas y el humanitarismo entre Rusia y Corea conviene a los intereses fundamentales de ambos pueblos y contribuira al aseguramiento de la paz y estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y toda la region del Nordeste Asiatico. 
					
					Deseo a Vd. buena salud y exitos y a todo el pueblo de la RPDC, la felicidad y el bienestar.
					
					Reciba el testimonio de mi alta consideracion.

articles.title: Publicado llamamiento de Comite Conjunto Nacional
articles.content:
Publicado llamamiento de Comite Conjunto Nacional
Pyongyang, 15 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Comite Norteno, Sureno y Ultramarino para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio hizo publico el dia 15 un llamamiento.
					Hoy cuando se cumple el 71o aniversario de la liberacion de la patria y de la division nacional, el Comite Conjunto Nacional vuelve a expresar la ferrea voluntad de estar al frente de la lucha por realizar el anhelo nacional a la reunificacion de la patria y llama a toda la nacion como lo siguiente:
					
					!Resolvamos el problema de reunificacion del pais con las fuerzas unidas de la nacion, autor de esta empresa nacional!
					
					!Logremos la unidad nacional rechazando toda clase de las maniobras de las fuerzas internas y externas opositoras a la reunificacion que imponen la division y la confrontacion!
					
					!Unamos las fuerzas e inteligencias de la nacion y promovamos la reconciliacion y unidad sobre la base del respeto al regimen y sistema de la contraparte!
					
					!Pongamos fin a las maniobras belicas y conflictivas incluso los ejercicios belicos conjuntos que amenazan la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y hagamos ingentes esfuerzos por el establecimiento del sistema de paz duradera!
					
					!Rehabilitemos y activemos los contactos y visitas multifaceticos, dialogos y reuniones por la reunificacion de distintos estratos del interior y exterior del pais!
					
					!Fomentemos activamente los actos conjuntos nacionales y los contactos y visitas multifaceticos por capas, sectores y entidades regionales como los entre obreros, campesinos, jovenes y estudiantes, mujeres, academicos, hombres de prensa y religiosos! 
					
					!Nos esforcemos activamente por realizar los contactos de diversas formas entre los partidos politicos y entidades sociales del Norte y el Sur y el gran acto pannacional por la reunificacion!
					
					!Restauremos cuanto antes los frutos preciosos a favor de la reunificacion, la paz y la prosperidad incluyendo la Zona Industrial de Kaesong y el turismo al monte Kumgang, adquiridos por los esfuerzos conjuntos del Norte y el Sur, y abramos de nuevo las vias aerea, terrestre y maritima de viaje!
					
					!Rechacemos la politica de division y enfrentamiento de las fuerzas internas y externas anti-reunificacion y unamonos las fuerzas e inteligencias de la nacion para superar las dificultades y penas de hoy basandose en las experiencias y los exitos con que abriamos el camino a favor de la reconciliacion, cooperacion, paz y reunificacion!
					
					!Acabemos con la division nacional y la confrontacion por la guerra y abramos de par en par el camino de la paz duradera y la reunificacion independiente!
